entry.title: BIP 21 (modification BIP 20)]
entry.summary: In a discussion on January 31, 2012, Wladimir questioned whether the "send to private address" should be included in the current Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) or if it should be saved for a future BIP. However, Pieter clarified that it is actually a "send of private key" and agreed that it should be addressed in a separate BIP.
